description:
Designed for everyday jobs, this kit bundles a slimline pocketknife with Gerber’s do-it-all multitool. The Suspension NXT has a skeletonized handle inspired by the bridges of Gerber’s hometown, Portland Oregon. Designed for everyday carry (EDC), the Suspension NXT builds on the success of the original Suspension multitool but with a slimmer more EDC friendly profile. With the tools on the outside, you can access everything but the pliers without opening the tool. For those times you don’t need a multitool, the Paraframe I pocketknife is small enough to stay out of the way, but big enough to be useful. Also outfitted with weight-saving skeletonized handles and one of the best locks available, the Paraframe I gives your EDC an edge.

  • 15 tools ranging from a combination blade to a scissors
  • Outboard tools are accessible without opening the tool
  • Locking tools help keep you safe
  • Integrated pocket clip makes each tool easy to carry
  • Fully moulded Philips driver fits more securely in screwheads than compact drivers
  • Compact spring loaded scissors for those cuts a knife isn’t right for
  • Paraframe I features a 420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Paraframe I: Framelock provides a solid lock that helps keeps you safe
  • Slim design carries well
  • Lightweight skeletonized handle
  • Dimensions: Paraframe I – blade 7.6cm, handle 10.5cm, Suspension NXT – blade 5.7cm, handle 11cm
name: Gerber Suspension NXT Black + Paraframe I Multi-tool Knives Set - Unisex
